fr.zelus.jarvis.plugins.generic_chat.platform

Class GenericChatPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zelus.jarvis.core.RuntimePlatform
      • fr.zelus.jarvis.plugins.generic_chat.platform.GenericChatPlatform

  • public class GenericChatPlatform
extends RuntimePlatform
    A generic RuntimePlatform class that wraps concrete chatting sub-platforms.

    This class is used to define generic ExecutionModels that can be bound to specific chatting platforms through the provided Configuration. ActionInstances created by this runtimePlatform wraps concrete ActionInstances defined in the concrete sub-platforms.

    This runtimePlatform provides the following generic RuntimeActions:

    • PostMessage: post a message to the channels specified in the provided Configuration
    Note: this runtimePlatform only provides a concrete implementation of GenericChatAction, that is used to represent all the RuntimeActions specified in the GenericChatPlatform. GenericChatAction construction is handled by the createRuntimeAction(ActionInstance, JarvisSession) method that overrides the default behavior of RuntimePlatform.
    See Also:
    GenericChatAction

    • Field Detail

      • CONCRETE_CHAT_PLATFORMS_KEY

        public static final String CONCRETE_CHAT_PLATFORMS_KEY
        The Configuration key to store the concrete chat sub-platforms to use.
        See Also:
        loadSubPlatform(String), Constant Field Values

      • CONCRETE_CHAT_PROPERTY_PREFIX_KEY

        public static final String CONCRETE_CHAT_PROPERTY_PREFIX_KEY
        The Configuration key prefix used to bound specific values to generic action parameters.

        As an example, this prefix is used to specify, for each sub-platform, the platform specific channel associated to the generic channel parameter.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericChatPlatform

        public GenericChatPlatform(JarvisCore jarvisCore,
                           Configuration configuration)
        Constructs a new GenericChatPlatform from the provided jarvisCore and Configuration.

        This constructor initializes the underlying sub-platform list with the concrete RuntimePlatform paths retrieved from the CONCRETE_CHAT_PLATFORMS_KEY Configuration property. Note that the property can contain a single path or a list.

        Note: this constructor will throw a JarvisException if at least one of the concrete sub-platforms cannot be built. The provided Configuration should contain all the sub-platform specific properties (e.g. access tokens).

        Parameters:
        jarvisCore - the JarvisCore instance associated to this runtimePlatform
        configuration - the Configuration used to initialize the underlying sub-platform list
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided jarvisCore or Configuration is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided Configuration does not contain a CONCRETE_CHAT_PLATFORMS_KEY property.
        See Also:
        CONCRETE_CHAT_PLATFORMS_KEY, loadSubPlatform(String)

      • createRuntimeAction

        public RuntimeAction createRuntimeAction(ActionInstance actionInstance,
                                         JarvisSession session)
        Creates a GenericChatAction wrapping the concrete sub-platform RuntimeActions corresponding to the provided ActionInstance.

        This method iterates the sub-platform list and calls their RuntimePlatform.createRuntimeAction(ActionInstance, JarvisSession) method with the provided actionInstance and session. The returned RuntimeActions are then wrapped into a GenericChatAction that takes care of executing them through the regular ExecutionService.handleEventInstance(EventInstance, JarvisSession) process.

        Overrides:
        createRuntimeAction in class RuntimePlatform
        Parameters:
        actionInstance - the ActionInstance representing the RuntimeAction to create
        session - the JarvisSession associated to the action
        Returns:
        the GenericChatAction wrapping the concrete sub-platform RuntimeActions
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided actionInstance or session is null
        JarvisException - if the provided ActionInstance does not match any RuntimeAction for a sub-platform, or if an error occurred when building the RuntimeAction
        See Also:
        GenericChatAction
